Package com.kpi.parallel.lab1.functions

Interface ArithmeticFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
FunctionA, FunctionB, FunctionC
public interface ArithmeticFunction
The ArithmeticFunction interface should be implemented by any class, whose main goal is to calculate an arithmetic function. Interface provides default methods, that contain basic operations on vectors and matrices. This software is created special for executing lab work for "Parallel programming" in KPI FICT.
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
Linenko Kostyantyn IO-01
